testDialogue.name: Pilot
testDialogue.dialogue: You're not going to [wave amp=50 freq=2]believe[/wave] this, but I just watched a space [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]whale[/rainbow] fly through a [tornado radius=5 freq=2]nebula[/tornado] and it was the most [shake rate=5 level=10]beautiful[/shake] thing I've ever [fade start=2 length=12]seen in my life.[/fade]

testDialogue.name: Commander
testDialogue.dialogue: Hey, if you're not [wave amp=50 freq=3]busy[/wave], could you pick up groceries on this flyby of this star system?

testDialogue.name: Pilot
testDialogue.dialogue: What, no, go get your own groceries. I'm busy here! Blam! Blam! See? Shooting pirates or something!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: How are you finding your ship? The TitanCoreX Shielding doesn't let us build anything big, so this was the best we could give you.

level1Intro.name: Pilot
level1Intro.dialogue: The lack of air-conditioning for my legs is unfortunate, but at least the noise dampeners work fine. The jumpsuit has pockets so that's a plus.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Right... Just try not to ruin it. Cloning you isn't free, and neither is the ship. We're going over a simulation today about the sorts of things you might expect to see in the field.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Take a moment to get your handling. Fiddle with the dice, write your name on it, get the seat warmers right, whatever it is that you need.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: You can use [color=#ff3333]%s%s%s%s[/color] to pilot the ship and [color=#ff3333]%s[/color] to slow yourself down. You can see your pilot seat when you're moving slow.

level1Intro.name: Pilot
level1Intro.dialogue: You're making this sound like it's a game or something. I've got the control wheel and it's handling fine.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Err, I didn't mean to say that life and death is a game. Regardless, we're going to start the simulation in just a second. You'll want to pay attention to this next instruction!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: The key is to go near hostile projectiles [wave amp=50 freq=2]without[/wave] letting it touch the center of your ship!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: This will let the TitanCoreX shielding absorb the radiation of the laser and you'll be able to shoot it back using [color=#ff3333]%s[/color].

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: If you are hit, you'll discharge energy to stay alive. Not enough energy? You die. Good luck!

level1Slipstream.name: Commander
level1Slipstream.dialogue: Oh, one more thing. You can fly into the sides to slipstream around! You'll need to force the movement for it to work!

level2Intro.name: Pilot
level2Intro.dialogue: Question. Why can't we absorb all the energy types? Follow up question, why can't we just install normal guns on this space ship?

level2Intro.name: Commander
level2Intro.dialogue: Uh, science reasons. Look, I'm a commanding officer, I just tell you what to do.

level2Intro.name: Pilot
level2Intro.dialogue: Great... Guess it doesn't matter so long as there's something to absorb...

level3Intro.name: Pilot
level3Intro.dialogue: The incoming fleet doesn't seem to be heavily armed.

level3Intro.name: Commander
level3Intro.dialogue: Good, good, you should be able to best them easily then. One of our forward scouts report that the fleet is using a new weapon type here. Something nicknamed 'Ring Protocol'.

level3Intro.name: Pilot
level3Intro.dialogue: I thought I was the forward scout?

level3Intro.name: Commander
level3Intro.dialogue: The forward forward scout. Someone's gotta look out for you after all!

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: You seem to be really certain about killing everyone here.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: We must avenge the planet! Look at what they did to this place!

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: Who is 'they' anyways? The academy was always theory.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: The Federation is our greatest enemy! They have been attacking our planets for decades! We are simply returning the favour now that we have the tech and your ship!

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: All I've seen so far is us finding wreckage after wreckage and cleaning up.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: We'll talk more later, for now - note that there is gravity tech in this sector that will mess with your controls. It shouldn't be dangerous but everything else will be.

level5Intro.name: Pilot
level5Intro.dialogue: Thanks for the vote of confidence.

level5Intro.name: Commander
level5Intro.dialogue: The weaponry here is far more advanced than anything you've seen before. I'm routing another battalion your way but we need you to do what you can to slow these forces down.

level5Intro.name: Pilot
level5Intro.dialogue: ...Anyone ever tell you that you're not an inspiration?

level6Intro.name: Commander
level6Intro.dialogue: We're going to be returning to headquarters after your successful mission but we'll need to route through this asteroid field. It should pass through soon.

level6Intro.name: Pilot
level6Intro.dialogue: Wouldn't it be safer to go around?

level6Intro.name: Commander
level6Intro.dialogue: Listen here, I give the orders, you just have to follow.

level6Intro.name: Pilot
level6Intro.dialogue: Fine, but I'm not doing this for you. I'm doing this for me.

level7Intro.name: Commander
level7Intro.dialogue: It is here. Now take out that Federation base.

level8Intro.name: Pilot
level8Intro.dialogue: Uh, that's an impressive looking fleet.

level8Intro.name: Commander
level8Intro.dialogue: With your flying, you'll be fine. Probably.

level9Intro.name: Commander
level9Intro.dialogue: If it was worth doing, it wouldn't be easy.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: Listen kid. I wanted you to know that I'm proud of you.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: Seriously, you've done incredible. I... think you should know the truth.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: The Star Shooter's project was our last effort to defeat the Federation.
